scripts.cpl-css: cd src && find . -iname "*.css" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-font: cd src && find . -iname "*.css" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-less: cd src && find . -iname "*.less" | while read f; do echo $f; mkdir -p "../dist/`dirname $f | sed -e 's/less/css/g'`"; lessc $f > "../dist/`echo $f | sed -e 's/less/css/g'`"; done
scripts.cpl-js: cd src && find . -iname "*.js" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-img: cd src && find . \( -iname "*.jpg" -or -iname ".gif" -or -iname ".png" \) | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.precpl-jade: npm run cpl-less && npm run cpl-js
scripts.prew-cpl-jade: npm run w-cpl-less & npm run w-cpl-js &
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run cpl-jade
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run w-cpl-jade
scripts.preserver: killall -9 node; sleep 5; npm run express
